tool_description: Extracts contact information including name, email, phone, address, and professional profiles from resume text.

resume_text.description: The full text content of the resume

extract_social.description: Extract social media and professional network profiles

country_code.description: Default country code for phone number parsing

error_messages: Empty resume text: Provide non-empty resume_text content for processing.
Invalid country code: Use a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (US, CA, GB, etc.).
No contact information found: The resume may not contain standard contact details or formatting.
usage: Provide the complete resume_text and optionally configure social media extraction and country code for phone parsing. The tool identifies and extracts various contact information fields.

phone_numbers.description: List of phone numbers in standardized format
